CustomField.formula: "Please return or resubmit your online application with the above requested item(s) within "+ TEXT(Days_to_Respond__c) +" days from the date of this letter. " + IF(Registration_Type__c = "Car Wash", "If you do not respond, your application will be rejected and you will forfeit your application fee.", IF(Registration_Type__c = "Child Performer Services", "Please return this notice along with the above requested items(s) within 30 days of the date of this letter.", IF(Registration_Type__c = "Garment", "If we do not receive the requested items and/or documents listed above within 60 days from the date of this letter, your application for registration will be rejected and the fee will be forfeited.", IF(Registration_Type__c = "Talent", "If you do not respond, your application will be rejected and you will forfeit your application fee.", IF(Registration_Type__c = "Janitorial", "If you do not respond, your application will be rejected and you will forfeit your application fee.", "")))))
CustomField.label: First Defect Text
